snippet.title: Nintendo DS Longplay [080] Wario Ware - Touched!
snippet.description:
http://www.longplays.org

Played by: NPI 

00:00:03 Story mode
01:19:27 Monster, Hardcore and Gnarly Megamix - Endless modes that you get when you beat the game in story mode

To unlock all of the mini games it would take a lot of repetition of the same, so to avoid that I have found a 100% savestate.

01:47:39 All the mini game (there are 3 variations of each, sometimes more). At 03:21:42 are the mini games of 9-Volt, the best ones!

During the game you also collect toys. Some are played during the story mode, as for others they are at the end of the longplay at 03:49:49 -
Disclaimer: Most videos by World of Longplays use SaveStates!
